text.name: longdescription
text.text: Philips CD-i (Compact Disc Interactive) a multimedia CD player developed/marketed by Royal Philips Electronics N.V. CPU Philips SCC68070 @15.5MHz RAM 1MB, Display 384×280-768×560, GPU Philips SCC66470, Sound MCD 221, ADPCM 8ch. Release date NA: 03 Dec '91 EU: 10 Jul '92.
